subject: All Star Games
Baseball
lead_paragraph: David Ortiz started with a home run off Zach Britton in Boston’s eight-run first inning, then ended by getting into a bench-clearing brawl with Baltimore reliever Kevin Gregg.
snippet: David Ortiz started with a home run off Zach Britton in Boston’s eight-run first inning, then ended by getting into a bench-clearing brawl with Baltimore reliever Kevin Gregg.
